section.title: Acknowledgements
section.para: &kx; is based on the work of thousands of developers contributing to Free and open source software. I am greatly indebted to all of you!

&kx; was inspired by Linux From Scratch, and the bootstrap phase of &kx; is build directly on Linux From Scratch.
So I owe a great debt to the people developing Linux From Scratch.
See also the Legal notice.
